content:
I am a PhD student in the Doctoral Team Unit ACROSS at LISER, Luxembourg. I study the relationship between cross-border mobility, attitudes and political preferences.
Besides working on this topic, I also enjoy programming with R by creating Shiny apps or packages that you can find on my GitHub repo. I also write blog articles about R from time to time.

title: Etienne Bacher
